entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued July 07 at 10:37AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SHORT TERM RISES ALONG THE MISSOURI RIVER NEAR WILLISTON... Recent and forecast heavy rainfall are expected to cause water rises along the Missouri River near Williston. The river is forecast to begin rising by Friday morning and approach flood stage Friday evening. Minor flooding will be possible Friday evening through Saturday night. Only minor impacts are expected at this time.
